description:
#1 Most Popular Christian Wallpaper App 
---------------------------------------------- 

Bible Lock Screens™ are Bible-based wallpapers for iPhone & iPad. Put the Bible into your daily life. Every time you look at your device! 

FEATURES: 

- Over 1,000 custom Bible-based iPhone & iPod Touch Lock Screens 
- iOS 7 Support & New Design
- iPhone 5 support for all images
- Thumbnail view!
- Categories (New, Popular, Love, Relationships, Encouragement, Prayer, etc.)
- 15-second Video Devotionals (from our Instagram page)
- Universal App optimized for iPhone, iPad & iPod Touch! 
- Weekly updates based on new app architecture!
- iPad-specific images, perfect for Landscape & Portrait modes
- Tap and hold to save to your Camera Roll on your device 
- Many more Bible Lock Screens™ (not available online) 
- Suggest a Verse (suggest verses for new Bible Lock Screens™) 

---------------------------------------------- 

iPhone users look at their lock screen many times a day, to use their phone, to check the time, or to use one of the millions of apps available on the iOS platform. 

The lock screen appears for about eight seconds and is the first thing you see when you use your iPhone. Eight seconds is a lot of time to be looking at something random. Why not use a background with Scripture on it! 

My heart is that these Bible Lock Screen backgrounds would help remind you of what the Word of God says and help you walk it out. 

---------------------------------------------- 

APP STORE REVIEWS: 

"This app is a GREAT buy! By far the best Christian wallpaper app in the AppStore. Such a great way to be encouraged daily by God's word in beautiful art form for your iPhone!" - Kim S. (iTunes User) 

"This has been so awesome! The variety of lock/home screens available is practically endless. I also love the new update. Flows great! What a great way to profess your faith in the 21st century. Get it!!" - Lando25 (iTunes User) 

"What a blessing it is to have this app! I'm able to encourage other people by sending them a pic. And when I look at my phone I get to be reminded of my sweet Savior the Lord Jesus Christ! Thanks a million times over! - Torch A. (iTunes User) 

"This app is the best for getting to know Bible verses and if you are having a bad day then you will always have something to look at when you turn on your social networking device." - R110545 (iTunes User) 

"I love this app! It has definitely replaced regular lock screen pictures I usually use and is also a great conversation starter when others use my phone! I hope to see even more screen options in the future!" - Mandi4787 (iTunes User) 

---------------------------------------------- 

Follow us on Instagram: @BibleLockScreens 

Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/biblelockscreens 

Follow on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/biblelockscreen 

Check us out online: http://www.biblelockscreen.com

Facebook and the Facebook logo are trademarks of Facebook, Inc. Bible Lock Screens in not affiliated with, endorsed, or sponsored by Facebook.

releaseNotes:
BIG UPDATE:

- New Fresh Design
- Push Notifications! 
(make sure to say YES to push notifications when prompted)
- Much faster performance
- Fixed crashing on older devices!
- Slide Menu (with swipe gestures from the left screen edge to the right)
- New TAP and HOLD to SAVE images
- New TAP and HOLD to COPY images, then text them to friends!
- Favorites section (now you can STAR each image you love and find them in the Favorites section)
- Pull to refresh at the bottom of each category to check for more images

PERSONAL NOTE: 
Hi, I'm Ryan. Bible Lock Screens™ has been a one man show (made in my spare time) since it hit the App Store. The success of this endeavor has been well beyond my wildest expectations and I just want to thank everyone who has downloaded my app, given valuable feedback & encouragement. I'm very thankful for you & I hope that Bible Lock Screens™ will continue to bless many & help put Scripture into people's lives. 

-----------------

Thanks so much for your support and please tell your friends, family & anyone you think would be blessed by this app. God bless you! 

-----------------

Follow us on Instagram: @BibleLockScreens 

Like us on Facebook at http://www.facebook.com/biblelockscreens 

Follow on Twitter at http://www.twitter.com/biblelockscreen 

Check us out online http://www.biblelockscreen.com
